dmroControl.description: This attribute determines whether the MRO function is enabled or disabled.

maximumDeviationHoTrigger.description: This parameter defines the maximum allowed absolute deviation of the Handover Trigger, from the default point of operation.

minimumTimeBetweenHoTriggerChange.description: This parameter defines the minimum allowed time interval between two Handover Trigger change performed by MRO. This is used to control the stability and convergence of the algorithm.

tstoreUEcntxt.description: The timer used for detection of too early HO, too late HO and HO to wrong cell.
